alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:22AM AKST until December 27 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY FOR DILLINGHAM NORTH AND WEST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Areas of blowing snow early Tuesday morning near Dillingham. Northeast winds gusting to 30 mph will reduce visibility to one half mile. * WHERE...Dillingham and areas north and west, including Aleknagik, Manokotak, Twin Hills, and Togiak. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate snow is expected through early this afternoon, with accumulations of 3 to 7 inches near Dillingham. Overnight, a narrow band of heavy snow showers will develop. This is most likely to occur between Togiak and Manokotak, with snow accumulations of greater than one inch an hour underneath the band of showers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
